item.title: Change exp
item.dc:creator: @Java_Owns Java Owns
item.description:
@Java_Owns wrote:

â€¦ ill tell u how

PurposeSpeed up the EXP rate.

Difficulty: 3

Assumed Knowledge: Ctrl + F and Basic Editing.

Server Base: TestScape

Classes Modified: clinet.java

Procedure
Step 1: Find this in your clinet.java

Code:

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

You should see

Code:

[code]if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
}
else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
{
TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
{
TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
}
else if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6 || FightType == 7)
{
TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerRanged);
}
else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
{
TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
actionTimer = 7;
}

Step 2: Replace
[/code]
Step 2: Replace

Code:

TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);

to

TotalExp = (double)(HOW MUCH EXP YOU WANT HERE * hitDiff)

Do this untill you see

Code:

TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 7;

Credits
I Justin I 99%
Java Owns 1% for posting

[br][size=1]Posted on: 04 April 2007, 04:25:47[/size][hr]Tell me if this helps

Read full topic

addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[1]), 1);
change the 2000 to what u want

then do it for others
